fact.description: The match is underway at Mineirao Stadium.
Can Costa Rica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in England's half?
Ball safe as England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the England defence as Joel Campbell fires in a strike for Costa Rica.
Throw-in for Costa Rica at Mineirao Stadium.
Throw-in for Costa Rica in their own half.
Costa Rica to take a throw-in in England territory.
Djamel Haimoudi signals a free kick to Costa Rica.
Goal kick for England at Mineirao Stadium.
Djamel Haimoudi signals a England throw-in in Costa Rica's half.

Djamel Haimoudi blows against Costa Rica's Randall Brenes for offside.

In Belo Horizonte England attack through Daniel Sturridge. The finish is off target, however.

Free kick England.
In Belo Horizonte England drive forward through Frank Lampard. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Costa Rica push forward at Mineirao Stadium and Randall Brenes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined England defence.
The first-half has come to a close in Belo Horizonte.

Costa Rica's Keylor Navas looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Play has been resumed.
